altername_name: GT Max Rev. All Japan Touring Car Championship
Zen Nihon GT Senshuken Max Rev.
name: Zen Nihon GT Senahuken Max Rev.
overview: The Super GT series, formerly known as the All-Japan Grand Touring Car Championship or JGTC (Zen Nihon GT Sensyuken), is a grand touring car race series promoted by the GT-Association (GT-A). Though the JGTC was authorized by the Japan Automobile Federation and recognized by the FIA, the Super GT is authorized directly by FIA. In Zen Nihon GT Senahuken Max Rev. the player can compete in different game modes like Battle, Championship, Time Attack, see his records. The game features 3d graphics and different camera angles from inside and outside the car, the official team and drivers from Nihon GT championship. Before each race the player can customize his car choosing the type of engine, gear, suspension, tires, brakes & aero.
